data.name: Banzai Escape 2 Subterranean - Eyes Set
data.detailed_description:
This DLC includes Eyes Set of 6 items:
  • Blank
  • Tiny
  • Dizzy
  • Sparkling
  • Horni
  • Horror

To customize your eyes appearance, go to inventory machine in the centre of the 1st floor.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Includes a Eyes Set player customization
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Spanish - Spain, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
